addStaker(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.newStaker: The address of the new staker

claimFighters(uint8[2],bytes,string[],st.details: The function verifies the message signature is from the delegated address.

params.modelHashes: Array of hashes representing the machine learning models for each fighter.
params.modelTypes: Array of machine learning model types for each fighter.
params.numToMint: Array specifying the number of fighters to be claimed for each fighter type.

params.delegatedAddress: Address of admin signer for messages.

returns._0: URI where the contract metadata is stored.

params.tokenId: The ID of the fighter to check for existence.
The unique identifier for the fighter token.

incrementGeneration(uint8).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.fighterType: Type of fighter either 0 or 1 (champion or dendroid).

returns._0: Generation count of the fighter type.

instantiateAIArenaHelperContract(address.details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

instantiateMintpassContract(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.mintpassAddress: The address of the new AAMintPass contract instance.

instantiateNeuronContract(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.neuronAddress: The address of the new AAMintPass contract instance.

mintFromMergingPool(address,string,strin.details: Only the merging pool contract address is authorized to call this function.

params.customAttributes: Array with [element, weight] of the newly created fighter.
params.modelHash: The hash of the ML model associated with the fighter.
params.modelType: The type of the ML model associated with the fighter.
params.to: The address that the new fighter will be assigned to.

params.tokenId: ID of the fighter being re-rolled.

redeemMintPass(uint256[],uint8[],uint8[].details: This function requires the length of all input arrays to be equal.Each input array must correspond to the same index, i.e., the first element in each array belongs to the same mint pass, and so on.

params.fighterTypes: Array of fighter types corresponding to the fighters being minted.
params.mintPassDnas: Array of DNA strings of the mint passes to be minted as fighters.
params.mintpassIdsToBurn: Array of mint pass IDs to be burned for each fighter to be minted.
params.modelHashes: Array of ML model hashes corresponding to the fighters being minted.
params.modelTypes: Array of ML model types corresponding to the fighters being minted.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Add a custom check for an ability to transfer the fighter.

params.tokenId: ID of the fighter being transferred.

setMergingPoolAddress(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

setTokenURI(uint256,string).details: Only the delegated address is authorized to call this function.

params.newTokenURI: The new URI to set for the given token.
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to set the URI for.

returns._0: Bool whether the interface is supported by this contract.
URI where the token metadata is stored.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Add a custom check for an ability to transfer the fighter.

params.tokenId: ID of the fighter being transferred.

transferOwnership(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.newOwnerAddress: The address of the new owner

updateFighterStaking(uint256,bool).details: Only addresses which have the staker role are authorized to call this function.

params.stakingStatus: The new staking status to set for the fighter.
params.tokenId: The ID of the fighter to update the staking status for.

updateModel(uint256,string,string).details: Only the owner of the fighter can call this function.

params.modelHash: The hash of the machine learning model.
params.modelType: The type of machine learning model.
params.tokenId: The ID of the fighter to update the model for.

MAX_FIGHTERS_ALLOWED().notice: The maximum amount of fighters owned by an address.

addStaker(address).notice: Adds a new address that is allowed to stake fighters on behalf of users.

claimFighters(uint8[2],bytes,string[],st.notice: Enables users to claim a pre-determined number of fighters.

constructor.notice: Sets the owner address, the delegated address.

contractURI().notice: Returns the URI where the contract metadata is stored.

doesTokenExist(uint256).notice: Checks whether the given token ID exists.

fighterStaked(uint256).notice: Mapping to keep track of whether a tokenId has staked or not.

fighters(uint256).notice: List of all fighter structs, accessible by using tokenId as index.

generation(uint256).notice: Stores the count of fighters seperated by fighterType as the index of the array.

getAllFighterInfo(uint256).notice: Returns all information related to the specified fighter token ID.

hasStakerRole(address).notice: Mapping to indicate which addresses are able to stake fighters.

incrementGeneration(uint8).notice: Increase the generation of the specified fighter type.

instantiateAIArenaHelperContract(address.notice: Instantiates the ai arena helper contract.

maxRerollsAllowed(uint256).notice: The maximum amount of rerolls for each fighter.

mintFromMergingPool(address,string,strin.notice: Mints a new fighter from the merging pool.

nftsClaimed(address,uint8).notice: Maps address to fighter type to return the number of NFTs claimed.

numElements(uint8).notice: Mapping of number elements by generation.

numRerolls(uint256).notice: Mapping to keep track of how many times an nft has been re-rolled.

numTrained(uint256).notice: Mapping of tokenId to number of times trained.

reRoll(uint8,uint8).notice: Rolls a new fighter with random traits.

redeemMintPass(uint256[],uint8[],uint8[].notice: Burns multiple mint passes in exchange for fighter NFTs.

rerollCost().notice: The maximum amount of rerolls for each fighter.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Safely transfers an NFT from one address to another.

setMergingPoolAddress(address).notice: Sets the merging pool contract address.

setTokenURI(uint256,string).notice: Sets the tokenURI for the given tokenId.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Returns whether a given interface is supported by this contract.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Returns the URI where the token metadata is stored.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer NFT ownership from one address to another.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership from one address to another.

updateFighterStaking(uint256,bool).notice: Update the staking status of the fighter associated with the given token ID.

updateModel(uint256,string,string).notice: Update the model for a token ID.
